title: Only in Iola
overview: Newcomers and city slickers Perry, Shanalee, and Braydon Sharboneau have discovered the warmth of small-town living among the wonderful people in Iola, Texas. Most people have no clue about this tight-knit community, where 300 residents and 39 businesses call home. Join this family as they navigate their new way of living. Witness the power of faith, family and the strength of community as this extraordinary family trades, their lavish lifestyle for a simpler, more meaningful existence. Don't miss this heartwarming premiere of Only in Iola that will touch your soul.
